attributes.additional_details: We elected Cameron as PM based on his ability to lead this country we should not be imposed by Boris Johnson or Michael Gove who are nothing but liars to get personal gain in our expense. They lied to people during referendum campaign and we should not trust them
attributes.background: Cameron has been excellent PM for 6 years and he should remain PM for the rest of the term. He has always had at heart the British interest and warned people of the consequences of leave EU. He was honest all the way just people didn't listen. Don't let Boris destroy anymore this country.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
